title: East Asian Culture and Civilization
description: The pre-modern and modern histories of China and Japan. Focus on the traditional era, the transition to modernity, cultural uniqueness within East Asian civilization, and western images of Asia. 4 lectures. Crosslisted as HIST 310/HNRS 312. Fulfills GE D5 except for History majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area A and one course from GE Area D2 or D3
